parameters.name: Aspect
parameters.description: Viewing aspect of the OLE object as defined in the DVASPECT enumeration (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Buffer
parameters.description: Data for the OLE object (see Remarks )

title: IModelDocExtension.ICreateOLEObject
description: Creates an OLE object on the active document.
signature:
SwOLEObject ICreateOLEObject( 
   System.Int32
Aspect
,
   ref System.Double
Position
,
   System.Int32
ByteCount
,
   ref System.byte
Buffer
,
   out System.Int32
ErrorCode
)

parameters.name: Aspect
parameters.description: Viewing aspect of the OLE object as defined in the DVASPECT enumeration (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Buffer
parameters.description: Data for the OLE object (see Remarks )

remarks:
Argument
Information
Aspect
Uses the DVASPECT enumeration, which has the following values:
DVASPECT_CONTENT = 1
DVASPECT_THUMBNAIL = 2
DVASPECT_ICON = 4
DVASPECT_DOCPRINT = 8
See the MSDN documentation for details about the DVASPECT enumeration.
Position
Specify:
Sheet coordinates for drawings.
Screen pixel coordinates for parts and assemblies.
Buffer
See
ISwOLEObject::Buffer
or specify
ISwOLEObject::IGetBuffer
- or -
Get the data from your own OLE object.
The data is in the format obtained from the Microsoft MFC object COleClientItem using the GetHGlobalFromILockBytes.
